City Council

The Council members adopt the laws and policies for the City. They also review and act on the Annual Budget that the Mayor submits to them. Members of the City Council can be reached at: P.O. Box 3066, Conroe, TX 77305; by phone at (936) 522-3010 or by fax at (936) 522-3009.
